message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $60?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $85?
Thanks for countering, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we settle at $70?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $82.50?
